All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
Represents a bank account.
AccountApiApplication
Main class for the Account Api.
AccountController
Controller class that handles HTTP requests related to bank accounts.
AccountRepository
Repository interface for storing bank accounts in the MongoDB database.
AccountRequest
Data Transfer Object (DTO) class that represents the request payload for a bank account holder.
AccountResponse
Data Transfer Object (DTO) class that represents the response payload for a bank account holder.
AccountService
Service class that provides operations for managing bank accounts.
AccountTestData
The AccountTestData class is a component that implements the CommandLineRunner interface.
ApiGatewayApplication
Main class for the Api Gateway.
Asset
Represents an asset.
AssetManagementApiApplication
Main class for the Asset Management Api.
AssetManagementClient
A Feign client interface for interacting with the Asset Management API.
AssetManagementController
Controller class that handles HTTP requests related to asset management.
AssetManagementRepository
Repository interface for storing assets in the database.
AssetManagementResponse
Data Transfer Object (DTO) class that represents the response payload for an asset.
AssetManagementResponse
Data Transfer Object (DTO) class that represents the response payload for an asset.
AssetManagementService
Service class that provides operations for managing assets.
AssetTestData
The AssetTestData class is a component that implements the CommandLineRunner interface.
ConfigServerApplication
Main class for the Config Server.
CustomBigDecimalRedisSerializer
Custom serializer for BigDecimal values.
DiscoveryServerApplication
Main class for the Discovery Server.
NotificationApiApplication
Main class for the Notification Api.
RedisConfig
Configuration class for Redis.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for security settings and JWT token handling.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for web security.
Transaction
Represents a transaction.
TransactionApiApplication
Main class for the Transaction Api.
TransactionController
Controller class that handles HTTP requests related to transactions.
TransactionEvent
Represents a transaction event between Transaction API and Notification API.
TransactionEvent
Represents a transaction event between Transaction API and Notification API.
TransactionItems
Represents a transaction item.
TransactionItemsDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) class that represents the response payload for a transaction.
TransactionRepository
Repository interface for storing assets in the database.
TransactionRequest
Data Transfer Object (DTO) class that represents the request payload for a transaction.
TransactionService
Service class that provides operations for managing transactions.
WebClientConfig
Configuration class for WebClient.
